title: KidzCruises Website Launches, Bringing Comprehensive, Unbiased Information on "Everything Family Cruising"
text: Receive press releases from KidzCruises: By Email RSS Feeds: KidzCruises Website Launches, Bringing Comprehensive, Unbiased Information on "Everything Family Cruising" Stotfold, Hitchin, United Kingdom, August 25, 2015 --( PR.com )-- KidzCruises (www.kidzcruises.com) is a brand new, quirky, fun website where holidaymakers can write and read reviews about family-friendly cruise holidays. Based in the UK, but covering world-wide family-friendly cruises, KidzCruises provides a platform for young travellers to give their opinions on what ‘floats their boat’.With over 21 million people worldwide taking cruise holidays in 2014 (source: CLIA), and an estimated 1.5 million of these travellers being under 18 years old – cruising has become extremely popular for families with babies and school-age children. But with limited opportunities for vacations during the academic year, it’s important to know that your cruise ticks all the boxes for each member of your travelling party – not just for the children, but for the adults too.KidzCruises provides comprehensive, unbiased, information on ‘everything family cruising’– from ship features, to crew interviews, to video reviews, to travel product reviews and competitions. Backed up with cruise reviews, KidzCruises aims to help families pick the best cruise line, ship, and destination for their next vacation.Contact KidzCruisesFor more information, please contact Tracey Kifford (tracey@kidzcruises.com / +44 (0)7932 986699) or Anna-Marie Miles (anna@kidzcruises.com / +44 (0)7763 566636).KidzCruises, 5 Franklin Place, Fairfield Park, Stotfold, Hitchin, Hertfordshire, SG5 4GT, UK Contact Information
